name: Warforged Name Generator
description: Unleash the metallic might! Forge a name worthy of a sentient construct with our Warforged Name Generator. Perfect for D&D, worldbuilding, or just plain fun!
introduction: So, you've got yourself a Warforged character, huh? Awesome! But before you go stomping around the battlefield, you need a name that screams 'I'm a living construct and I'm here to kick butt!' This generator is your one-stop shop for crafting the perfect moniker, blending ancient runes, mechanical precision, and a dash of good ol' fashioned fantasy flair. Prepare to be amazed!
howToUse: First, brace yourself for awesomeness! (Seriously, these names are *that* good.)
Click the 'Generate' button. Keep clicking until you find a name that resonates with your Warforged's personality and backstory.
Feeling adventurous? Mix and match prefixes and suffixes to create a truly unique name.
Steal the name for your character. We won't tell anyone. 😉
Go forth and conquer! Your Warforged, now properly named, is ready for anything!

faqs.question: What exactly *is* a Warforged?
faqs.answer: In Dungeons & Dragons, Warforged are sentient constructs, often made of metal, stone, and wood. They were originally built for war, but now seek to find their place in a world that's changed.

faqs.question: Are these names only for D&D?
faqs.answer: Nope! While inspired by D&D, these names can be used for any fantasy setting, sci-fi world, or even just for naming your robot vacuum cleaner (we won't judge!).

faqs.question: Can I use these names for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: While we encourage creativity, we recommend checking the copyright and trademark laws related to any specific name if you plan to use it commercially.

faqs.question: How are these names generated?
faqs.answer: Our generator combines a carefully curated list of prefixes and suffixes inspired by Warforged lore, mechanical terms, and ancient languages. A little bit of code magic does the rest!

faqs.question: I don't like any of the names! What do I do?
faqs.answer: Keep hitting that 'Generate' button! With thousands of possible combinations, you're bound to find a name that clicks. Or, get inspired and create your own based on the prefixes and suffixes provided.

faqs.question: Will this generator steal my personal information?
faqs.answer: Absolutely not! This generator operates entirely client-side. We don't collect any data from you. Your Warforged naming adventures are your own!
